attributes.description:
Price: R200000
Mileage: 195000km
2014 Hyundai IX35 2.0 Elite Automatic for sale. Don't miss this new spec iX35 SUV automatic. Car is very well kept in excellent condition and comes with full service history and books.
Standard Features: ABS | EBS | Stability Control | Power Steering | Central Locking |  Aircon | Climate Control | CD player/AUX input/USB port/Bluetooth | Panoramic Sunroof | Towbar | Leather Interior 

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Hyundai iX35 2.0 Elite Automatic 
Power - 116 kW @ 6200 rpm
Torque - 192 Nm @ 4000 rpm
Economy - 8.8 l/100km
Emissions - 200 g/km
Emissions Rating - X
Gears - 6 / FRONT
Acceleration - 11.5 seconds
Top Speed - 177 km/h
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,410 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 55 litres
Boot Capacity - 591 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km

Complete the form below and one of our stock specialists will be in contact with you in due course, alternatively call us on 011 854 1340 or visit us at our dealerships situated at Cnr Nirvana Drive & Klipspruit Valley Rd (K43), Trade Route Mall, Lenasia, 1827 in Gauteng. We will assistance you personally with more information, arrange finance or arrange a test drive. Trade-ins are welcome. Terms and Conditions apply.
